Defs:
Boomratkin_Base Boomratkin Born in the secret labs of the Ratkin Kindom, Boomratkins were treated like oil-crops. Although gained freedom thanks to the fall of the kingdom several hundreds years ago, they still suffered from agony and major discrimination. Ratkins take their ugly appearance as a sign of omen, and indeed, they do brought disasters. Nowadays, a major population of existing Boomratkins are in partisan troops, living on raids, suicidical terrorism and hatred toward their creators. Intractable laboratory creations. Produce chemfuel and explode on death. UI/Icons/Xenotypes/Boomratkin_Base true NamerPersonDirtmole_Male NamerPersonDirtmole_Female 1
BRKGene_ChemfuelGland
Hair_SandyBlonde
Libido_High
Nearsighted
PsychicAbility_Dull
NakedSpeed
AptitudePoor_Shooting
AptitudePoor_Melee
AptitudePoor_Crafting
AptitudePoor_Artistic
AptitudePoor_Plants
Learning_Fast
Superclotting
StrongStomach
Fertile
Boomratkin_HE High-energy Boomratkin Born in the secret labs of the Ratkin Kindom, Boomratkins were treated like oil-crops. Although gained freedom thanks to the fall of the kingdom several hundreds years ago, they still suffered from agony and major discrimination. Ratkins take their ugly appearance as a sign of omen, and indeed, they do brought disasters. Nowadays, a major population of existing Boomratkins are in partisan troops, living on raids, suicidical terrorism and hatred toward ordinary Ratkins. Intractable laboratory creations. Produce chemfuel and explode on death. UI/Icons/Xenotypes/Boomratkin_HEF true NamerPersonDirtmole_Male NamerPersonDirtmole_Female 1

Boomratkin_Fert Fertilizer Boomratkin During the long vagrancy, some of the Boomratkins adapted themselves to cater human farms needs, having glands that produce chemical fertilizers. They eat less, and the explosions on their deaths are less lethal. Although considered as cowards for their history, they are still welcomed by the Boomratkin patrisans for their ability to produce food. Intractable laboratory creations. Produce chemfuel and explode on death. UI/Icons/Xenotypes/Boomratkin_Fertilizer true NamerPersonDirtmole_Male NamerPersonDirtmole_Female 1
